doc.title: Irony
doc.plot: During spring break, three teens decide to take a hiking trip to an unexplored forest. But, what starts off as a simple hike, quickly takes a dark turn when Johnny, the only one who knows the way out of the forest, disappears after an accidental fall in a nearby river. Shocked by the tragic event the two remaining friends try to find a way out of the forest before night falls. As their hope slowly begins to diminish, friendship and trust is put to the test.
